name: Lily
tagline: Lily is a simple lightweight Web Framework developed and maintained by Mohammed Yehia
body:
# Lily
Lily is a simple light weight yet a powerful framework for php web development. Currently Lily is under heavy development. If you want to contribute please contact me at firefoxegy@gmail.com

## About Lily Development
Lily is a simple and powerful PHP web development framework. It will help PHP web developers develop powerful web applications with a set of excellent components.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
